About Me

My name is Grif and I live in Boston with my partner Katherine. What else?

  • I serve as the executive director at Peer 2 Peer University.
  • I co-organize Whose University Is It?
  • I am a former fellow at the Berkman Klein Center.

I occasionally write on Medium and tweet on Twitter.
